content:
A quotation mark has been supplied as the delimiter for the TextFieldParser, but EscapeQuotes is set to True.

To correct this error

  • Set EscapeQuotes to False.

See Also

SetDelimiters
Delimiters
TextFieldParser
How to: Read From Comma-Delimited Text Files
